Name: p.instruction_obstacle_passive
Description:
Instruction incudes a passive contstruction.
Werte: Enthalten, Nicht Enthalten

Name: p.instruction_obstacle_complex_np
Description:
Instruction includes a complex noun phrase.
Werte: Enthalten, Nicht Enthalten

Name: p.instruction_explicitness_of_instruction
Description:
Specifies the exact number of correct answers.
Werte: Explizit, Implizit (= number not specified)

Name: c_id
Description:
Question number - difficulty (1 = Stammaufgabe, 2 = leicht, 3 = schwer) - question version
If the c_id is 41-1-4, then 41 is the question number, 1 is the difficulty, and 4 is the version of the question.
